rooms.description: Brutalist style entrance with exposed concrete finishes and robust industrial design elements. Incorporates Vastu by aligning the main entry towards the northeast.
Open space featuring high ceilings and raw concrete surfaces; includes seating areas with built-in bookshelves for a semi-library feel.
Spacious dining space adjacent to the living room. The layout ensures flow from entry to main living spaces, following Vastu guidelines of balanced energy distribution.
A spacious master bedroom with a private balcony overlooking the entrance area; designed for privacy and relaxation.
Second bedroom maintaining robust Brutalist design with emphasis on structural integrity and large windows for natural lighting.
Third bedroom designed to maintain uniformity in space distribution while incorporating Vastu aspects by avoiding south-west corner placement.
Dedicated servant's quarters including a small kitchenette and sleeping area. Locates on the peripheral side of the ground floor to maintain privacy for residents.

openings.description: Large concrete door with glass panels, designed to channel positive energy according to Vastu principles.
High windows for ample natural light, consistent with Brutalist style yet mindful of privacy aspects.
